comment: Main text block with vertical columns of Chinese characters, framed by a thick black border. The text is written in traditional vertical format from right to left, typical of classical Chinese printing. The content appears to be an official or scholarly document, possibly a preface or imperial decree, referencing '聖旨校定許慎說文解字一部' (Imperial edict to review and standardize Xu Shen's Shuowen Jiezi).
